div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2211 Trapani (anc. Drepanum), 1921 (1128) Burial: c. 250 B.C. ? (Jenkins-Lewis) Contents: c. 100 EL Carthage Disposition: unknown Orsi's notes Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, (p. 61) suggest that this may be identical with Lilybaeum 1922, no. 2209 above
